job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>This position is a great opportunity for an entrepreneurially-minded person who enjoys making a difference in a start-up environment. Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to both create and extend existing models.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Build, extend, deploy, maintain, and troubleshoot machine learning solutions to help drive business metrics. </li><li>Collaborate with analytics and data teams to optimize machine learning model performance and data pipelines.</li><li>Ensure our relevancy in the field of machine learning by staying up to date on the latest ML techniques and become the subject matter expert within the company.</li><li>Develop solutions to complex problems without considerable technical direction.</li></ul><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications and Experience</strong></p><ul><li>2-4 years of experience as a machine learning engineer or data scientist</li><li>Experience with developing software in object-oriented programming languages, including Python, Scala, Java, or C++</li><li>Experience with machine learning tools, including Tensorflow, Pytorch, or Scikit Learn</li><li>Proven and demonstrated experience with data preparation, building, scaling, and optimizing machine learning solutions</li><li>Self-driven, organized, reliable and determined team player</li><li>Thinks analytically and solves complex problems within a team structure</li><li>Flexible and able to adapt to new processes and requirements in a dynamic environment</li><li>Strong, clear and concise written and verbal communication skills</li><li>Advocates for innovation and drives change through persuasion and consensus</li><li>Translates issues/problems into solutions with tangible changes that improve the team or the organization</li></ul><p><br></p><p>***Unfortunately, this position does not offer work sponsorship&nbsp;at this time***</p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong><em>Keywords:</em></strong><em> machine learning, ML, engineering, data science, programming, models, modeling, python, tools, data, building, deploying, scaling, troubleshooting, maintaining, strategy</em></p>
